A

addPatron(Patron) - Method in class library.Library
Adds a patron to the library's list of patrons.
addPublication(Publication) - Method in class library.Library
Adds a publication to the library's collection.

C

checkOut(int, int) - Method in class library.Library
Checks out a publication to a patron.
checkOut(Patron) - Method in class library.Publication
Checks out the publication to a patron, setting the due date.

I

InvalidRuntimeException - Exception in library
The InvalidRuntimeException class is a custom exception class that extends the standard ArithmeticException class.
InvalidRuntimeException() - Constructor for exception library.InvalidRuntimeException
Constructs a new InvalidRuntimeException with no detail message.
InvalidRuntimeException(String) - Constructor for exception library.InvalidRuntimeException
Constructs a new InvalidRuntimeException with the specified detail message.
InvalidRuntimeException(String, int) - Constructor for exception library.InvalidRuntimeException
Constructs a new InvalidRuntimeException with a formatted detail message indicating that a title has an invalid runtime.

L

library - package library
 
Library - Class in library
The Library class represents a library with a collection of publications and patrons.
Library(String) - Constructor for class library.Library
Constructs a new library with the given name.

P

Patron - Class in library
The Patron class represents a library patron with a name and email.
Patron(String, String) - Constructor for class library.Patron
Constructs a new patron with the given name and email.
patronMenu() - Method in class library.Library
Generates a menu listing all patrons in the library.
Publication - Class in library
The Publication class represents a publication, such as a book, with properties including title, author, copyright year, and loan information.
Publication(String, String, int) - Constructor for class library.Publication
Constructs a new Publication with the specified title, author, and copyright year.

T

toString() - Method in class library.Library
Returns a string representation of the library, including its name and a list of publications.
toString() - Method in class library.Patron
Returns a formatted string representation of the patron, including their name and email.
toString() - Method in class library.Publication
Generates a string representation of the publication.
toString() - Method in class library.Video
Generates a string representation of the video, including its title, author, copyright year, and runtime duration.
toStringBuilder(String, String) - Method in class library.Publication
Helper method to build a part of the string representation.

V

Video - Class in library
The Video class represents a video publication, extending the Publication class, and includes additional properties such as runtime duration.
Video(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class library.Video
Constructs a new Video with the specified title, author, copyright year, and runtime.
